mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_answers (user_id, paper_id, question_type, question_id, user_answer, is_correct, score_obtained, answer_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{paperId}, #{questionType}, #{questionId}, #{userAnswer}, #{correct}, #{scoreObtained}, #{answerTime})

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO user_answers (user_id, paper_id, question_type, question_id, user_answer, is_correct, score_obtained, answer_time) VALUES (#{item.userId}, #{item.paperId}, #{item.questionType}, #{item.questionId}, #{item.userAnswer}, #{item.correct}, #{item.scoreObtained}, #{item.answerTime})

mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, paper_id, question_type, question_id, user_answer, is_correct, score_obtained, answer_time FROM user_answers ORDER BY answer_time DESC

SELECT id, user_id, paper_id, question_type, question_id, user_answer, is_correct, score_obtained, answer_time FROM user_answers WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND paper_id = #{paperId} ORDER BY question_type, question_id
mapper.update: UPDATE user_answers SET user_id = #{userId}, paper_id = #{paperId}, question_type = #{questionType}, question_id = #{questionId}, user_answer = #{userAnswer}, is_correct = #{correct}, score_obtained = #{scoreObtained} WHERE id = #{id}
